data.name: Matrix of Palindromes
data.description:
Write a function to generate a matrix of 3 letters palindromes with x number of rows and y number of columns. 

Function should return a string representation of the matrix

For example 
```java
MatrixPalindromes.createMatrix(3,3) -> "[[aaa, aba, aca], [bbb, bcb, bdb], [ccc, cdc, cec]]"
```
```python
create_matrix(3, 3) --> "[[aaa, aba, aca], [bbb, bcb, bdb], [ccc, cdc, cec]]"
```
```javascript 
For JavaScript return matrix as a string.
MatrixPalindromes(3,3) --> 'aaa,aba,aca,bbb,bcb,bdb,ccc,cdc,cec'

```

The matrix builds by the following logic :

The row defines the first and the last letter.

Row 0 -> "a", row 1 -> "b", row 2 -> "c" ... row 25 -> "z"

Row + column defines the middle letter.

Column 0 : row 0 -> "a", 

Column 0 : row 1 -> "b",

Column 1 : row 1 -> "c

...

Column 0 : row 25 -> "z".

The following restrictions are applied to all test cases :

row and col are in range 1 to 26 

row + col <= 27.

These restrictions are there to guarantee that the matrix will contain only chars from the alphabet.

Good luck.
